description: Defines the FacilityEntity class, representing a facility (parking, lounge, hotel, etc.) in the airport facility service platform. The class includes fields for unique ID, type, code, name, description, location, status, pricing, metadata, creation, and update timestamps.

classes.name: FacilityEntity
classes.description: Entity class mapped to the 'facilities' table, representing a facility with various attributes such as type, code, location, status, and timestamps.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID identifier for this facility.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the UUID identifier for this facility.

methods.name: getFacilityType
methods.description: Returns the type of the facility.

methods.name: setFacilityType
methods.description: Sets the type of the facility.

methods.name: getCode
methods.description: Returns the code identifier for the facility.

methods.name: setCode
methods.description: Sets the code identifier for the facility.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the facility.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the facility.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the description of the facility.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the facility.

methods.name: getLocationText
methods.description: Returns the location text of the facility.

methods.name: setLocationText
methods.description: Sets the location text of the facility.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Checks if the facility is active.

methods.name: setActive
methods.description: Sets the active status of the facility.

methods.name: getPriceBase
methods.description: Returns the base price of the facility.

methods.name: setPriceBase
methods.description: Sets the base price of the facility.

methods.name: getCurrencyCode
methods.description: Returns the currency code used for the facility's price.

methods.name: setCurrencyCode
methods.description: Sets the currency code for the facility.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns the JSON metadata associated with the facility.

methods.name: setMetadata
methods.description: Sets the JSON metadata for the facility.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the facility.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the facility.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the facility.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the facility.
